definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The third part mostly introduces the legal system in the securities depository process.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要介绍了证券托管环节中的法律制度。

sentences.english: After World War I, Syria became a French mandate.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战后，叙利亚成了法国的托管地。

sentences.english: The trust group will not bear loss of the entrusted company.
sentences.chinese: 托管组不承担被托管证券公司的亏损。

sentences.english: The trust group will not bear loss of the entrusted company.
sentences.chinese: 托管组不承担被托管证券公司的亏损。

sentences.english: What are the 3rd party hosted service for form processing to avoid PCI complaince?
sentences.chinese: 什么是第三方托管格式处理以避免PCI投诉服务？

sentences.english: Custodian fee of fund is set aside every day and paid every month.
sentences.chinese: 基金托管费每日计提，按月支付。

sentences.english: It is understood that Tony is his co-trustee.
sentences.chinese: 不言而喻，托尼也是他的托管人。

sentences.english: Many business owners are still uneasy about hosting sensitive data off-site.
sentences.chinese: 许多企业主至今仍然对托管敏感数据心存疑虑。

sentences.english: Synchronization Providers can be written in both managed and unmanaged code.
sentences.chinese: 同步提供程序可用托管和非托管代码编写。

sentences.english: Synchronization Providers can be written in both managed and unmanaged code.
sentences.chinese: 同步提供程序可用托管和非托管代码编写。

sentences.english: Posterous, a blog hosting network, doesn’t even require registration to start using it.
sentences.chinese: 一个博客托管网络，使用甚至不要求注册。

sentences.english: Keep your online resume hosted for free on these cool websites.
sentences.chinese: 将你的在线简历托管到这些酷站上吧。

sentences.english: Ever used a print server hosted by Microsoft?
sentences.chinese: 用过由微软托管的打印服务器么？

sentences.english: They were produced by a French company, Thales, and the model was known as AA.
sentences.chinese: 这些皮托管由法国的泰勒斯公司生产，型号为AA。

sentences.english: If you have a website, you need a self-hosted blog.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一个网站，你需要一个自托管的博客。

sentences.english: Server hosting business can be divided into machine hosting and virtual host.
sentences.chinese: 服务器托管业务可细分为整机托管与虚拟主机。

definition: to administer/to manage/to hold in trust or escrow
to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
to receive sth on another's behalf
